entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
